Thanks for supplying the code so we can troubleshoot your problem!

Odds are you used a loop to add the bonus xp, instead of getting the actual skill being trained

item.title: Pi Brawling gloves help
item.dc:creator: @king_he_he king he he
item.description:
@king_he_he wrote:

Can someone help me with melee brawling gloves? i add them and added the exp bonus. But when u use them it give u a exp bonus on all stats even the ones you arent training. any ideas? Thanks

if(c.playerEquipment[9] == 13845) {

		c.playerXP[0] += 50;
	
		c.playerXP[1] += 50;
	
		c.playerXP[2] += 50;
	}

Read full topic
